attributes.title: OMT Hobo Bag
attributes.description:
Created on May 3, 2011 by onemangotree on Sourcemap.org:

http://www.onemangotree.com/hobobag7.html
Our Hobo Bag was designed by Hilary Dell for the Global Girlfriend Collection. Hilary is a former One Mango Tree Design Intern. The bag with twisted handles is one of our most popular designs. This map takes you on a geographical journey to understand where the pieces of the product come together. All components are gathered in Kampala and then transported (usually via public bus) to Gulu, where the handbags are cut and assembled by our 30 tailors in the One Mango Tree Gulu workshop. Once the product is complete, it's sent (again, via bus) back to Kampala and then shipped using FedEx courier services to our US office in Strongsville, Ohio. The hobo bag is part Chinese (textile), part Ugandan (textile), part American (label) and a whole lotta love. We hope you enjoy learning more about where your products come from!
Learn more about One Mango Tree at www.onemangotree.com

attributes.name: OMT Hobo Bag

attributes.name: Kitenge Fabric (body fabric)
attributes.title: Kitenge Fabric (body fabric)
attributes.description:
We buy our handbag fabrics in local markets, but the materials are produced in China and shipped in small 6-12 yard pieces to market vendors - fabrics arrive in Mombasa and travel over land/Lake Victoria to arrive in Kampala, where we purchase from local vendors.

READ MORE: http://onemangotreeuganda.blogspot.com/2011/03/fabric-shopping-back-to-our-roots.html

attributes.name: Liner fabric (natural cotton bag liner)
attributes.title: Liner fabric (natural cotton bag liner)
attributes.description:
We buy our handbag liner from a Ugandan company - they manufacture the liner out of 100% organic cotton grown all over Uganda. The company is not yet GOTS-certified.

READ MORE: http://onemangotreeuganda.blogspot.com/2010/07/our-organic-cotton-fabrics.html

attributes.name: Threads
attributes.title: Threads
attributes.description: We source threads from a market in Guangzhou - for lack of an East African thread source.

attributes.name: OMT Label
attributes.title: OMT Label
attributes.description: The One Mango Tree labels are made by TexLabel, an outfit in Los Angeles, California.
